name: mido
description: Mido. Manage your tasks like a pro

scripts.start: docker compose up -d && npm run log
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.format: npm run stop && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/app -w /app node:18.8 sh -c "npm install -g prettier && prettier --write ."
scripts.check: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/app -w /app node:18.8 sh -c "npm install -g prettier && prettier --check ."

author: BlackDayz
